TestCase.TestCaseTitle: Update a TaskOrg by deleting elements
TestCase.TestCaseObjective: Test whether the Producer/Provider is able to update a TaskOrg by removing units and the Consumers are able to correctly understand (and display) it.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: The Producer updates a TaskOrg by removing units. The Consumers receive the data and process them.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: Nation A has created a topic. Nation B has subscribed to this topic. TaskOrg of MIP4SLT3IS_6335 is loaded.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the updated TaskOrg is displayed correctly on both Nationsâ€™ C2IS.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A updates a TaskOrg by removing Units
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B displays the data correctly.
